title: Apple and tomato chutney
ingredients: ['1kg (2 lb) apples - peeled, cored and sliced', '450ml (16 fl oz) water', '1 tablespoon yellow mustard seeds', '1kg (2 lb) tomatoes, sliced', '2 large onions, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '85g (3 oz) sultanas', '140g (5 oz) caster sugar', '2 1/2 dessertspoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 dessertspoons salt', '560ml (1 pint) malt vinegar']
